alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Hudspeth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued July 04 at 5:18AM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK. THE MCGREGOR POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR AYSHA LYNN CROSS, WHITE, FEMALE, 14 YEARS OLD, 05 FEET 02 INCHES, 105 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, HAZEL EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING. THE MCGREGOR POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR EMILEE SOLOMON, WHITE, FEMALE, 14 YEARS OLD, 05 FEET 01 INCH, 175 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING UNKNOWN CLOTHING. UNKNOWN SUSPECT OR VEHICLE DESCRIPTION LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THIS CHILD TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE MCGREGOR POLICE DEPARTMENT. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS MCGREGOR POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 5 4 8 4 0 2 8 5 5.
